Title_Lang_enUS: Fall of the Lich King (25 player)
Description_Lang_enUS: Defeat every boss in Icecrown Citadel in 25-player mode.
Defeat Lord Marrowgar without any raid member remaining impaled for more than 8 seconds in 25-player mode.
Defeat Lady Deathwhisper with at least five different types of Cultists active at the time of her demise in 25-player mode.
Claim victory in the Gunship Battle without any raid member visiting the enemy gunship more than once in 25-player mode.

Title_Lang_enUS: I've Gone and Made a Mess (25 player)
Description_Lang_enUS: Defeat the Deathbringer before Mark of the Fallen Champion is cast five times in 25-player mode.
Defeat Rotface without a Big Ooze casting Unstable Ooze Explosion in 25-player mode.
Defeat Festergut while none of the players in your raid group ever had 3 stacks of Inoculated in 25-player mode.
Defeat Professor Putricide without using Regurgitated Ooze on the Abomination in 25-player mode.
Defeat the Blood Council without anyone in the raid taking more than 25,000 spell damage in a single hit in 25-player mode.
Defeat Blood-Queen Lana'thel once as a vampire and again without becoming a vampire in 25-player mode.
Enter every portal spawned by Valithria Dreamwalker before healing her to full health in 25-player mode.
Defeat Sindragosa in 25-player mode without any member of your raid receiving more than 5 stacks of Mystic Buffet.
